title: Under the Cool Sound
detail_text: <:th_ch0008/>The wind chime sounds so nice~. Hearing it kind of cools me down.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>Yeah, it sure is nice.... But it’s still really hot!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>Ahaha.... You’re right....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>Let’s fill up some buckets and soak our feet in them!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>That’s a great idea!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>It feels so good~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>The combination of sound from the wind chime and water buckets make for a perfect summer!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0001/>No, we need one more thing.... Hanayo-chan, let’s make shaved ice!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0008/>I want strawberry flavor!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
